Package duration

Class CompactDuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • duration.CompactDuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Duration, java.lang.Comparable<Duration>
    public final class CompactDuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Durations represented compactly, with a range of 0 to 263-1 seconds.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CompactDuration​(int hours, int minutes, int seconds)
      Constructs a duration in terms of its length in hours, minutes, and seconds.
      CompactDuration​(long inSeconds)
      Constructs a duration in terms of its length in seconds.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String asHms()
      Formats this duration in the form H:MM:SS where the hours and minutes are both zero-padded to two digits, but the hours are not.

      boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)  
      int hashCode()

      Returns the number of whole hours in the given number of seconds.
      long inSeconds()
      Gets the total duration in seconds.
      protected static long inSeconds​(int hours, int minutes, int seconds)
      Converts an unpacked hours-minutes-seconds duration to its length in seconds.
      protected static int minutesOf​(long inSeconds)
      Returns the number of whole minutes in the given number of seconds, less the number of whole hours.
      Duration plus​(Duration other)
      Returns the sum of two durations.
      protected static int secondsOf​(long inSeconds)
      Returns the number of seconds remaining after all full minutes are removed from the given number of seconds.

      • asHms

        public java.lang.String asHms()
        Description copied from interface: Duration
        Formats this duration in the form H:MM:SS where the hours and minutes are both zero-padded to two digits, but the hours are not. The duration should be in canonical form, meaning that both the minutes and the seconds are less than 60.
        Specified by:
        asHms in interface Duration
        Returns:
        this duration formatted in hours, minutes, and seconds
